1.0.name: wordpress/wordpress-form
1.0.description:
Wordpress Form is a Wordpress plugin that generates a contact form on your website or blog. It can also be used as a suggestion box. After adjusting the preferences (such as where do you want the email to go) simply insert text [WORDPRESS-FORM] in any page, post, widget content and the form will appear.

The plugin is designed to use your website's CSS so the design is likely to match your website and if not there is a special area in the settings where you can customize the use of CSS.

We will continue working on the plugin as we get feedback from you. Learn more about Kenmore Design here: Forex Web Design

Our forex web design company provides state of the art design and web development services for new and well established forex brokerages.
